tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Defending His Honor
programme.desc: An ambulance pulls up to a crash site where a woman, Jennifer Wilson, is found injured and crying for her baby. Unbeknownst to her, the six-month-old baby died in the accident. A Navy judge stands accused of vehicular homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Enemy Below
programme.desc: Kabir is preparing an attack against the U.S. and was last seen crossing the border from Afghanistan to Iran. He is believed to have recruited Capt. Yerastov, a Russian submarine captain. Turner, Harm and Mac help in the hunt for the terrorists.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Bud has lost his right lower leg due to a mine in Afghanistan; during emergency surgery he faces bad trouble. Sturgis returns to Washington, and Harm and Mac disobey an order from the admiral. Bud encounters an astounding change of course.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rogue Element
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Revenge
programme.desc: When Sylvester accidentally triggers an explosive device during an investigation, Team Scorpion must focus on finding who's responsible even while their friend's life hangs in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dominoes
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Team Scorpion races to find a way to save a young boy's life after he gets trapped in a beachside cave and drowning is imminent.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Tired from this long investigation, the team continue where one of them realises that the idea to investigate along was a mistake, but can the others get there in time. And something has a final message for the team as they leave.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads Most Haunted to Accrington's old police station and courts, housing playful spirits and malevolent entities. Is the evil too much for the team?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation at the now-abandoned old police station and courts in Accrington. With the team splitting up to cover as much space as they can, something seems to be stalking them.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT3
programme.desc: The third and final part of this terrifying and intriguing investigation into the paranormal activity at Accrington’s Old Police Station and Courts.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding is back with the first part of a brand-new episode of Most Haunted. The intrepid ghost hunter has taken her team to the historic hall, which is said to be haunted by ancestral ghosts, the apparition of a white lady and a demon dog.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shamrock Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,the TAPS team has been asked to go to Paddy Reilly's Bar in Manhattan, New York to help explain some after hours activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Innocent Until Proven Dead
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 3
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues a ship returning from peace talks with the Magog.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog attack has dire consequences. The Andromeda is destroyed, Trance and Dylan are presumed the only survivors and Dylan escapes into the route of ages.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan ends up on Seefra, where the superstitious population has no technology.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka is dumped on Seefra after the Andromeda is stolen, and Dylan must prove the ship is his.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Still on Seefra, Dylan finds Harper, who has adjusted to life there.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: It turns out Doyle is an android, built by Harper to contain Rommie's core programming.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.109
programme.desc: While away in rehab, a woman claims her ex-husband neglected to pay rent and utilities and broke her bike/A man sues the mother of his child for overpayment of child support; she says he should consider it the back support that he never paid.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.145
programme.desc: Botched football jerseys are the source of contention between fellow team moms who are suing each other for refunds and damages from alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nA HUD house inspection leads to a conflict between a teenage mother and her ex-roommates.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.36
programme.desc: Young man admits making payments on dirt bike he claims was a gift from ex-girlfriend/Man accuses 15-year-old of throwing rock at truck on freeway; teenager blames cousin, countersues for harassment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.13
programme.desc: A woman claims her ex-boyfriend asked her to pawn her jewelry to pay their bills; he says she offered to do it/A loan to pay DUI bills is disputed by ex-lovers, one of whom claims it was a birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.140
programme.desc: Older couple accuses daughter and stepson-in-law of abuse including unpaid loans and theft; young couple denies. Man denies responsibility for drunk driving accident, claims friend knew he was intoxicated.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.21
programme.desc: Partygoer punched, falls into window, needs 30 stitches; assaulter alleges invasion of personal space/Surprise party host sues friends for fighting, property damage/Woman accused of keying car denies jealousy retaliation involving boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.216
programme.desc: A bar patron, who was beaten up and knocked out, blames the bar co-owner for putting him in danger after he was ejected from his establishment.\t\t\t\r\nBrother sues brother over missed payments on a Ford Crown Victoria.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.174
programme.desc: A hit-and-run, drug charges, and an alleged bailout leave a teenager suing her ex-roommate’s boyfriend for a loan. He claims he never asked for her help.\t\t\t\r\nA woman claims her former friend racked up charges on a rental car that was in her name.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.57
programme.desc: A father of four denies owing his ex-lover for bail after being\t\t\t\r\narrested for violating a restraining order filed by his estranged wife/A tattoo artist demands that a former customer pay for the balance on an unfinished tattoo.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.68
programme.desc: A teenager accuses her former live-in fiancé of assault after she allegedly catches him with another woman; she sues him for rent, security deposit, and bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.163
programme.desc: A man and his 16-year-old daughter move in with her 20-year-old boyfriend who later sues them for rent and eviction fees; they accuse him of stealing their property.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Paris Hilton is in attendance at the dinner service, but will she prove more of a distraction or just be distracted?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Using only their eyesight, their noses and their taste buds, the four remaining chefs must re-create a dish without a recipe.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must create fusion dishes by mixing cuisines from two different countries, the winner has a dinner date with Chef Ramsay and their family while the losers participate in moving day.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two finalists are taken to LA Market where the winner will work, and told to cook five dishes for a taste test.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The signature dish challenge kicks of Gordon Ramsay's US cooking competition, with the most successful team getting to enjoy a lunch at the LA Market restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With a trip to Palm Springs in a private jet up for grabs, the contestants compete by cooking four pieces of meat to Chef Ramsay's instructions.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Everybody Just a Child?
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt have an unpleasant confrontation with a group of skateboarding ruffians who don't want to give up their car. Froy and Sonia try to take a vehicle from the world's most volatile couple. Plus, Lou and Froy wind up in unknown territory when...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Off the Hitch
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get the worst service ever from a street-side coffee vendor who won't give up his truck. Then, Froy and Lyndah confront a failed actor who has abandoned his dream and his responsibility for his car payments. Finally, it's death...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt & Froy Auto Recovery
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia make their way to a home in the hills to clean a germaphobe of his car. Then, it's Matt and Froy's big repo. Having left the company to start their own, they head out after a high-end exotic car from outside a mansion.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Win Some, Quarrelsome, Lose Some
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia have an order for a Jaguar behind a retail outlet center, but will the loaders let their precious car be loaded up without a fight? Then, Matt and Froy find themselves amidst a lover's quarrel.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Weren't Informed
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy end up on one of the weirdest repos they've ever encountered when a white cargo van unleashes a wave of workers. Then, Lou, Sonia, and Rob go green when they find they learn the Mercedes Benz they are after has been converted.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tijuana Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy's business hits another snag when a gang of bat-wielding partiers keeps them away from a car and a paycheck. Then, Lou and Sonia wind up in the crosshairs when they attempt to repo a car from a man who appears to be a federal agent.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lyndah's Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy continue their risky run in Tijuana, confronting a strip club owner who keeps a tight grip on his vehicle and his employees. Then, Lou and Cousin Rob are in a case of he said- she said when a seductive young debtor calls in the police.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Role Play
programme.desc: Jeff promises to take Audrey to an upmarket and very popular restaurant but forgets to book a table. Determined to dine there, he hatches a plan to get in by claiming that a last-minute reservation is needed for a celebrity.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Catering
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University. While waitressing, Audrey tries to fit in with the guests, only to discover that they are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cooking Class
programme.desc: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen. Russell doesn't notice how disturbingly similar his new girlfriend is to Timmy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Unpleasant Surprises
programme.desc: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend. Things don't go as planned, however, so Jeff, Russell, and Timmy must improvise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Timmy Quits
programme.desc: Audrey has always had suspicions that Jeff's old college friend Heidi harbours romantic feelings for him, so Jeff invites Heidi over to prove that this was never the case.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Wee Problem
programme.desc: Jeff does his best to make a heavily pregnant Brenda laugh when he discovers that she has a `wee problem' due to her condition, but his antics cause her waters to break. Meanwhile, Adam annoys Audrey with his non-stop chatter during a spa visit.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: Jennifer tries to help Jeff’s sore neck with a massage until the situation between them becomes uncomfortable and upsets Audrey. Meanwhile, Russell brings Adam along to help him fight off a school yard bully so Russell can get close to the teacher.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".(n)

programme.title: Daybreakers
programme.desc: The year is 2019, and an unknown plague has transformed the world's population into blood-thirsty vampires. As humans and their blood become more scarce, vampires must search for new ways to satisfy their craving.(n)

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Special Agent Sally Biggs has a secret, she can rewind time whenever she wants. It's enough to make her a celebrity at the FBI and allows her to control almost everything in her life... Except for the disappearance of her husband.(n)

programme.title: Frank Herbert's Dune: Episode 1
programme.desc: On order of the emperor, Duke Leto Atreides moves his family from his home planet Caladan to another planet, Arrakis, also known as Dune. After an attack on their stronghold, his son Paul and his concubine flee into the desert.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: After years of hiding from a society that shuns him, Hellboy and his team attempt to stop the resurrection of an ancient witch who once spread an unstoppable plague before she was locked away by the legendary King Arthur.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: Bolo
programme.desc: Two convicts get freed from prison and become lawmen in a corrupt village.(n)

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: Rene and Dennis try one last con in this crazy Christmas comedy starring Paul Rudd, Paul Giamatti and Sally Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: A Bulldog For Christmas
programme.desc: Becky really hates Christmas. But when she is magically transformed into a cute bulldog, she has to learn the meaning of Christmas and get into the holiday spirit or she may never be changed back. An entertaining Christmas film for the whole family.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Consultant
programme.desc: This Lifetime Original Movie stars David Hasselhoff as a sought after consultant hired by a workaholic mother (Caroline Rhea) in an effort to get her and her family through the holidays.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: You Belong To Me
programme.desc: After a radio talk show host takes to the airwaves to discuss recent slayings of lonely women aboard cruise ships, she receives information that leads her to believe she knows the killer and may be the next target.(n)

programme.title: Her Son’s Secret
programme.desc: Sarah has never given up. Having lost her son Matt 13 years ago – presumed drowned and the body never recovered -- she still keeps her hopes up. One day, Matt shows up at Sarah’s door.(n)

programme.title: Siege
programme.desc: The siege was one of the worst and unexpected cases of violence both Napier and New Zealand had witnessed and it was all the more shocking because of its ordinary suburban backdrop.(n)

programme.title: Mortal Fear
programme.desc: Based on the novel. A crazed killer is infecting healthy patients with a disease that makes them age dramatically. No one can identify what the virus contains, and in the meantime they must race to stop the killer.(n)

programme.title: Drive Angry
programme.desc: A brutal felon escapes from hell and, with police and a satanic henchman on his trail, sets out to avenge his daughter's murder and save his grandchild from bloodthirsty cultists.(n)

programme.title: The Curse of Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: A man inherits an ancestral mansion and an ancient curse stemming back to the Crusades. As he battles to keep demons in the house at bay, he tries to awaken the beautiful Briar Rose to rescue her from a terrifying netherworld.(n)

programme.title: Sing Street
programme.desc: In 1985, a Dublin teenager (Ferdia Walsh-Peelo) forms a rock 'n' roll band to win the heart of an aspiring model (Lucy Boynton).(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: In a lawless and violent time, six young outcasts are hired by an English merchant as 'regulators' to guard his ranch against the mob, a corrupt and powerful ring.(n)

programme.title: John Wayne: Stolen Goods
programme.desc: A town is repeatedly victimized by "The Polka Dot Bandit" and it's up to the Marshall to save the day. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Eleanor Hunt, George "Gabby" Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A Texas town dominated by two feuding families mistake Hoss and Little Joe for hired bloodthirsty killers.(n)

programme.title: A Horse Story
programme.desc: Monican hevonen Champion murtaa hevosten perinteen ja paljastaa, että hevoset osaavat puhua. Monica auttaa sitä selvittämään, minkälainen hevonen se haluaa olla isona. Samalla Monicalle selviää oikea tie elämässä.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.(n)

programme.title: The Stolen Princess
programme.desc: In the age of knights, princesses and sorcerers, Ruslan embarks on a quest for his stolen princess and to prove, that love is stronger than magic.(n)

programme.title: Super
programme.desc: After his wife falls under the influence of a drug dealer, an everyday guy transforms himself into Crimson Bolt, a superhero with the best intentions, but lacking in heroic skills.(n)

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.(n)

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You
programme.desc: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged. Starring: Woody Allen, Goldie Hawn, Julia Roberts, Edward Norton, Drew Barrymore, Natasha Lyonne, Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: The Paris Police recruit the officer of an English ship to help trap counterfeiters by joining them.(n)

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: An unusual relationship develops between a fugitive killer and a runaway orphan on an odyssey across England.(n)

programme.title: One Jump Ahead
programme.desc: Intrepid British reporters attempt to stay ahead of the authorities as they track a killer and a child witness.(n)

programme.title: One Way Out
programme.desc: A policeman risks his career when he accepts a bribe to keep his daughter from being implicated in a robbery.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: When Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a cocktail lounge piano player, he and his old flame (Marietta DePrima) become targets of a killer. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes the owner of a house of ill repute in New Orleans, where he must avert the murder of a mysterious young woman (Georgia Emelin) who lives there. Rita Taggart guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: An obsessed fan stalks Sam (Scott Bakula), who has leaped into the life of the lead singer of a rock band with a scheming manager (Peter Noone). With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: A Hunting We Will Go - June 18, 1976
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a bounty hunter who is handcuffed to his prey, a female embezzler (Jane Sibbett) who incites such passion in him that he becomes confused over her guilt. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: Last Dance Before an Execution - May 12, 1971
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a convict in the electric chair moments before receiving a last-minute stay of execution, which gives him 48 hours to prove his innocence. Julio Oscar Mechoso and Jenny Gago guest star.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Pavor Nocturnus
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus wakes up on the floor of the Sanctuary with no recollection of why or how she got there.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Fragments
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus fights to save the life of one of the Sanctuary’s research scientists who was viciously attacked by a seemingly docile Abnormal.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Veritas
programme.desc: Will goes up against the heads of the Sanctuary Network to defend Magnus who is charged with a shocking murder.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Eat Sin (REDUX)
programme.desc: Under the effects of a space/time warp, members of the Tulip's crew find themselves alone in their own parallel universe, dealing with a separate version of their marauding psychopathic prisoner, "Five.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Girls (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a wealthy socialite and his two daughters book the Tulip for a passage to Mars, Percy and the destructive young women become fast friends, creating serious trouble for Dante.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Seed (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is abducted by an Orchard agent (Tosca), in an effort to track down Travis. Tosca believes that he is the key to the Divinity Cluster.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)
